title: CORRECTED-Bodies of 3 men, 3 women found at scene of attack targeting Baghdadi-jihadist source
text:
(Corrects to show commander saying purported body of Baghdadi not found with others but believed to be taken away by attacking forces)

BEIRUT, Oct 27 (Reuters) - The bodies of three men and three women were found at the scene of an attack targeting Islamic State leader Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi, whose body was taken away by attacking U.S. forces, a commander with a jihadist group in the area said.

The commander said a second body, believed to be that Baghdadi's deputy, was also removed by the attacking forces in the northwestern Idlib region of Syria. (Writing by Tom Perry; Editing by Alison Williams)
